job description:
Data Engineer
Boston, MA

The data engineer will drive complex assignments from a technical perspective, and provide analysis and guidance to development efforts surrounding information usage, interdependencies, and security as required. The individual should have expert knowledge of one or more technical/business domains, be able to interact across functional boundaries, and explore emerging technologies, documenting standards and procedures for their usage. Must have proficiency with relational databases and expertise in data integration and data quality development, as well as data management standards and concepts.

General Requirements:
  • Two or more years of experience using CVENT.
  • Experience with/exposure to Salesforce, and, in particular, experience with Salesforce data loader and building reports in Salesforce.
  • Troubleshooting/Helpdesk/Tier One customer-service experience a plus.
  • to QA one's own work a plus.
  • Experience with data management, data cleaning, data visualization report creation. - researching and implementing new products.
  • Experience managing relationships with vendors.
  • Detail-oriented a plus. Specific Products/Skills
  • Advanced including pivot tables, formulas, data-cleaning techniques, data visualization – pivot charts and graphs, etc.
  • CVENT
  • Salesforce
Interested? Here's what you do next:
If this position has captured your interest and you are excited to learn more, please apply now and the appropriate TCML Recruiter will be sure to reach out to you soon!

TCM is an EEO/Vets/Disabled Employer.
